description: Enhanced business suggestion system with AI-powered recommendations
changelog: Implemented AI-powered business suggestion system with intelligent selection
Added comprehensive business recommendation dialog with auto-open functionality
Enhanced business analysis with scoring algorithm based on lot characteristics
Improved UI with 3-column responsive grid layout for business suggestions
Integrated theme system support for business recommendation components
Added robust fallback system for business data selection
Fixed TypeScript compilation errors across business suggestion components
